metadata.title: CVE-2018-17467 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficiently quick clearing of stale rendered content in Navigation inGoogle Chrome prior to 70.0.3538.67 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
